author: fh:ez.no
msg: - Hurrah, we parse text messages correctly.

author: ts:ez.no
msg: - Fix bug #7897: Access to 'step' property does not work through overloading

author: dr:ez.no
msg: - Added support for a non-integer maximum.
- Added an optional parameter to the advance() method that advances the
progress bar with a different step size than 1.
Fixed some typoes in the docs.

author: sa:ez.no
msg: - Fixed unreported bug: ezcConsoleOutput::toPos() fixed typo in parameter.
